page.title: 02COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {Burtonwood}is a quiet village surrounded by farmland. It lies 20 miles away from the major cities of {Liverpool}and{Manchester.}This enables villagers to have the best of both worlds, a peaceful village or the bustle of the city. Regular{bus services}to the nearby towns of {Warrington, St. Helens}or{ {Newton-le-Willows}enable people to do their bulk shopping at the large supermarkets since the village shops, although well stocked, have only a limited choice. {Inter-city train services}connect { {St. Helens,}and{Newton}with cities throughout the country. The{M.62,}a major{arterial road,}also links the village with other major routes, towns and cities.
